title: What are some of the most cringeworthy K-pop song lyrics? - Quora

response.answer_text: I love NCT, but literally nothing can be worse than the english lyrics of Regular, take it in with all of it’s glory: “I like shining, you be lyin' I be grindin', you waste time Know you wanna roll with me 'Cause you know I put it down When I show up, I'm the one and only No, no, no (No, no) Yeah, pull up in the Jag Haters gon' be mad I be walkin' with the cheese, that's that queso (Queso, queso) Diamonds drippin', better bring your raincoat (Splash) I got them racks on me (On me) I brought the whole lit team with me I might pull up in a spaceship Hop out it, don't look like I live here And now we in a zone (Oh) Stand too close, might catch a cold Crib came with a gate and a code Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah Drippin', water faucet, splash (Splash) VVS my diamonds, I don't need no light to shine Iced out both my wrists, now I can barely see the time I just made a million and I'm still not satisfied 'Cause I need a bag on the regular I spend a bag on the regular We make the world go (Do-do, do-do-do, do-do-do) My bank account go (Do-do, do-do-do, do-do-do) We make the world go (Do-do, do-do-do, do-do-do) Brrrah! Dinero, peso, yen, lo quiero, I want it I am too rich to compete, so don't compare 'em to me (Yeah, yeah) We are not the same, only one of me (Hey, hey) Hopped out the coupe, the sky is the roof (Roof) My whole team ball (Ball) We never lose, hundreds all blue (Hundreds) We do what we do (Ball) Hoppin' out casket-fresh, looking like a fashion show (Ayy) Diamonds all on my neck, looking like a water show (Ayy, let's go) She gon' bust it, bust it, bust it, for a real one We gon' bring out the car One way, no stop, to the stars (Aw, yeah, yeah, yeah) Crew fly, Dubai No, it ain't two sides, too high One way to Mars, you better watch yourself I did it all by myself (Go!) And now we in a zone (Ice, ice) Stand too close, might catch a cold (Stand too close) Crib came with a gate and a code (Yeah, yeah, yeah) Yeah, yeah, drippin', water faucet, splash VVS my diamonds, I don't need no light to shine (Oh) Iced out both my wrists, now I can barely see the time (Oh) I just made a million and I'm still not satisfied 'Cause I need a bag on the regular (Regular) I spend a bag on the regular (brrrah!) We make the world go (Do-do, do-do-do, do-do-do) My bank account go (Do-do, do-do-do, do-do-do) We make the world go (Do-do, do-do-do, do-do-do) Brrrah! (Yeah, yeah) Dinero, peso, yen, lo quiero, I want it Multi-color diamonds like the rainbow (Yeah, yeah, yeah) PLR your eyes 번져 눈부셔 Yeah 자체발광 we flash 주체안돼 let's dance Yeah, this isn't real, this is a regular move 머리 어깨 무릎발 무릎발, let's get bounce Oh! Oh! (Oh) Run it up, run it up, run it up (Run it up) No competition in front of us We got the wave, we getting paid (Oh) VVS my diamonds, I don't need no light to shine (Oh) Iced out both my wrists, now I can barely see the time (Oh) I just made millions off it, but I'm still not satisfied 'Cause I need a bag on the regular (Regular) I spend a bag on the regular We make the world (Do-do, do-do-do, do-do-do) My bank account go (Do-do, do-do-do, do-do-do) We make the world go (Do-do, do-do-do, do-do-do) Brrrah! (Yeah, yeah) Dinero, peso, yen, yo quiero, I want it”

Lisa’s whole rap in the Japanese version of DDU-DU-DDU-DU I keep it lit like a matchstickBitch, I’m a star, but no PatrickI’m getting cake, that’s a fat checkAll on a roll like a graduateThis smart mouth spit dumb heatLike Ice-T, I’m OGI’m demon like I-T, Got more juice than HI-C And let’s not forget her line in As It’s Your Last Imma fall in love baby, you gon finna catch me  That one part in FANCI by GIRLKIND All my bad unnies, all my hood unnies  Sehun’s infamous line in Love Me Right Shawty imma party til the sun down  That one rap Vernon did (the way he rapped it killed me lmao) you were like—a bit foreign, eyes beige, darkish blondish, shorter than me  And Jackson came out with a bunch of good songs in the past but y’all idk what happened with Made It Slow down we can get some chills, ayGotta get them chillsParty like endless Sunday (Sunday)Gotta get them chills, celebrate like everyday birthdayRock it like we drivin' through the endless highway (highway)All the party DNA inside my blood, oh hey yeah (hey yeah)Catch 'em do yeah we come forPlease tell me yeah chilling party I ain’t noneCatch it we gon' party, we no stressed til' noon (stressed til' noon)  Edit: I took Namjoon out y’all now leave me alonE Edit #2: nvm I’m bringing him back Let’s not forget that one time Namjoon hit us with that line in 싸이하누월 And I’m sexy, like a pornstar

Iconic: “you look fresh like a salad, so smooth”-bts “sexy free and single and ready to bingo” -super junior “If you find a sweating foreigner, give them the directions.” -f(x) “roll like a buffalo”-EXO “shawty imma party till the sun down”-EXO “mazeltov” -ZE:A “music, turn it up, I’d pick my nose out of boredom” -BTS “I’ll pop my pimple” -BTS “lipstick chicken” - G.NA “This isn’t snow, it’s poop poop poop”- BTS “she’s my religion so I can call you she-sus” -BTS “but I’m Neutrogena deep clean, just come out as foam” -BTS “Got an automatic dick, got an automatic stick” -BTS “Be my Barbie at the BBQ.” -MYTEEN “Your sexy mind and your sexy body You were even born with sexy brain wrinkles” -BTS “No, I can’t be. I’m not Buddha. I’m not a lady.” -KARA Shitty: “I can’t hold back anymore. I’m going to hit you somehow. I’m going to fix you up so you won’t be able to see my girl ever again. You, you, you, you. Just get in my car. You need a beating. How dare someone like you hurt my girl’s feelings.” -Rain "People are stealing glances at you / I's embarrassing, what's wrong with you? / I like it if it's only in front of me / Do this only in front of me / Stop being so stubborn, I'll try to trust you more / It's way too low-cut, what's up with showing all that skin? / Be careful when you stoop down low / You're gonna show everything underneath / I can see everything, what's wrong with you? / Who are you doing this for?" - Infinite "Girls are like an equation, us guys just do them / Girls are the best present / I don't care about girls, I'll play once & say goodbye / Her hair, body, waist, legs / Even her other unspeakable parts / Saying I don't care would be ridiculous as a guy / Girl, your temptations keep me away from my computer every night / Because of who? Because of girls / Because of what? Because of hormones / Because of what? Because I'm a guy / Because I'm a guy? Because you're a girl" -BTS "Even if I cheat, don't you cheat, baby / Even if I forget you, don't you ever forget me, lady / If once in a while I don't contact you & I go out to drink / Even if I ever meet another girl's gaze / Only look at me" -Taeyang Reply

War of hormones — BTS i found that song very offensive and cringy. The song talks about women as if they were objects that are meant to entertain men's vision with lyrics like: Ah, I feel like I’ve gone crazy, crazy lately Girls that makes me cough, cough Their clothes are all revealing, revealing Very much thank you, increase my vision My eyes keep going that way Girls’ stomachs yup Girls are equations, we men do it yup Sweat forms, I act weak for no reason Please wear it more often, high heel I’m 18, I know all there is to know The fact that girls are the best in the world Yes I’m a bad boy so I like bad girl Girls are the best presents presents My real wish is just you, just you If I have you then I’m ok Oh I can’t control it, every day Your front side is the best, your back side is the best too From head to toes, best best It’s not worth a penny, I have no interest in girls who want to play once or twice and then break-up But when I look at you, I learn The architecture of body My testosterone that heavily grows After I win the fight with hormones, I study about it. Your existence is unfair, a foul If the standard of aesthetics is the ocean, you’re a bit too much A cultural asset that needs to be taken care by the state Her hair, body, waist, legs, and even the place that I can’t say Saying that I have no interest, is really unbelievable for me as a man I go crazy over just one small gesture Girl because of your seductions, I stay there every night my computer seat For her, lady first Girls are a cold iceberg let it go Females that make me go crazy They stimulate me every day After finishing my fight with hormones today, I pop my pimples Because of who, because of females Because of who, because of hormones Because of who, because of males Because I’m a male, it’s because of females Because of who, because of females Because of who, because of hormones Because of who, because of males Because I’m a male, it’s because of females I used to listen to bts's songs every once in a while but after finding this song i felt very offended and stopped listening to them.

The most cringe-worthy K-pop song that I’ve ever heard is "Epilogue: Young Forever" by BTS. I love this song. The English translation for this song goes like this: [Verse 1: Rap Monster]The curtain falls and I’m out of breathI get mixed feelings as I breathe outDid I make any mistakes todayHow did the audience seemI’m happy with who I’ve becomeThat I can make someone scream with joyStill excited from the performance [Verse 2: Suga]I stand on the empty stage while holding onto an aftertaste that will not linger for longWhile standing on this empty stage, I become afraid of this unpleasant emptinessWithin my suffocating feelingsOn top of my life’s lineWithout a reason, I forcibly act that I am fineThis isn’t the first time, I better get used to itI try to hide it, but I can’tWhen the heat of the show cools downI leave the empty seats behind [Verse 3: J-hope]Trying to comfort myselfI tell myself the world can’t be perfectI start to let myself goThe thundering applause, I can’t own it foreverI tell myself, so shamelessRaise your voice higherEven if the attention isn’t forever, I’ll keep singingAs today’s me, I want eternityForever, I want to be young [Chorus: V]Forever we are young [Jungkook]Under the flower petals raining downI run, so lost in this maze [V]Forever we are young [Jin]Even when I fall and hurt myselfI endlessly run toward my dream [Jimin (Suga)]Forever ever ever ever(dreams, hopes, forward, forward) [V]Forever ever ever everWe are young [Jimin (Rap Monster)]Forever ever ever ever(dreams, hopes, forward, forward) [Jimin]Forever ever ever everWe are young [Jungkook]Forever we are young [Jimin]Under the flower petals raining downI run, so lost in this maze [V, Jimin]Forever we are young [Jin]Even when I fall and hurt myselfI keep running toward my dream [All, Jungkook, Jimin, V]Forever we are youngUnder the flower petals raining downI run, so lost in this maze Forever we are youngEven when I fall and hurt myselfI keep running toward my dream

I’ma just list the English ones lol. (Btw, I still love some of these songs). Wolf - Exo. “It’s a oorf! Awooooo!” Angel - VIXX. “Nooo mooorre cryyyy…” - N Special - Monsta X. “I’m a special baby! Uh uh! Don’t stop, hey lady!” - Minhyuk Cat and Dog - TXT. “I don’t wanna be just friends. I just wanna be your pet…” War of Hormone - BTS. “Yes, I’m a bad boy, so I like bad girl!” - Jungkook Livin’ It Up - Monsta X. “LET’S LIVIN IT UP!!!” Alligator - Monsta X. “Hello! I’m an alli alligator WATCH OUT!” - Jooheon Hyde - VIXX. “We started from the bottom…but we just do it now, HYEH!!!!???” - Ravi Wave - ATEEZ. “We fishy fishy like dtughinolifjdj” - Hongjoong Cherry Bomb - NCT. “Cherry bomb, feel it yum…I’M THE BIGGEST HIT ON THIS STAGE! If you’re happy and you know it clap your hands, y’all.” X-Phenomenon - Monsta X. “We ain’t stop.” - IM Shootout - Monsta X. “Excuuuuuse me, I’m walking like zombie!” - Jooheon Treasure - ATEEZ. “You think about be my boat.” Boombayah - BlackPink. “Middle finger up! F you, pay me!!! 90s baby I pump up the jam!” - Lisa But the gold medal goes to… Tropical Night - Monsta X. “Yeah I’m freakin busy, who can tell me lazy? Baby, move the way I’m ballin’! I’m tropical body, so rollin rollin rollin. For my future it’d be worth it” - IM I love MX and all, but they have some of the dumbest English lyrics.

Hyomin's "Nice Body" is a misogynistic mess glorifying South Korea's unrealistic beauty standards: “Any woman would love to show off Any woman goes on a diet at least once When you’re a woman, you of course want to receive love The prince of my dreams will certaintly appear to me I take note on everything I want to eat I live noxiously everyday I endure all the pains I’m going to be prettier I’m going to love you more, I’m going to show you more of it I will change, you will see My body is a nice nice body Legs are very slim, with my hot waist (give me love, give me love, give me love) My body is a nice body As if everyones surprised they turn back at once to look Now, they can’t ignore me Any man, as if they’re all the same, love pretty women Every man thinks about sex at least once If only they were thinking about me, would be great if it were me My body is a nice body As if everyones surprised they turn back at once to look Now, they can’t ignore me Baby I’ve gone through so much You don’t know hard I worked because of you My nice style, My good feeling style I’m also proud now”

Roly Poly (but I love the song) T-ara - Roly Poly lyrics + English translation  Roly Poly How far have you come, have you gone off to hide somewhere again I’ve come to like you I I I I I I like you Where did you come from, I keep looking at you Your gaze I really like it I want to go near you but I don’t have the courage My heart is fluttering I’m hesitating I don’t know What do I do I don’t know I’m going to go crazy I’m afraid to lose you I want to move closer to you So you won’t be able to leave my side Roly Poly Roly Roly Poly Even if you push me away I’m going to come back to you Roly Poly Roly Roly Poly You’re only going to see me I’m going to show you who I am Why are you looking at the time Time stopped the moment we met I really like you I must be a little weird today I keep getting nervous Seeing you, I get hesitant I don’t know I’m getting anxious I don’t know I’m going to go crazy In case you go off to somewhere else I’ll come closer step by step So you’re somewhere where I can see you Roly Poly Roly Roly Poly Even if you push me away I’m going to come back to you Roly Poly Roly Roly Poly You’re only going to see me I’m going to show you who I am I like like this I like like that I like this like that yeah Roly Poly Roly Roly Poly Even if you push me away I’m going to come back to you Roly Poly Roly Roly Poly You’re only going to see me I’m going to show you who I am Ah Ah Ah Ah Tonight It’s time now You’re going to come for me Oh Tonight Ah Ah Ah Ah Tonight You’ll be waiting You won’t want to let go of me too

"Been a bad girl, I know I am And I’m so hot, I need a fan I don’t want a boy, I need a man" “Uh, I'ma fall in love baby You gon' finna catch me Uh, give you all of this baby Call me pretty and nasty" "YAH YAH YAH BOOMBAYAH YAH YAH YAH BOOMBAYAH YAH YAH YAH YAH BOOM BOOM BA BOOM BOOM BA OPPA” "Bitch I’m a star but not Patrick I’m getting cake that’s a fat check" "Like Ice T I’m OG I’m the man like I T Got more juice than hi-c" "Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah Rum, pum, pum, pum, pum, pum, pum"

Ring Ding Dong by SHINee I love this song but the lyrics are just so cringey and hilarious. Onew’s voice was heavily auto-tuned but still one of my best kpop songs from the past and SHINee as well. Ring ding dong, ring ding dongRing diggy ding diggy ding ding dingRing ding dong, ring ding dongRing diggy ding diggy ding ding ding…………………………… We wanna go rocka, rocka, rocka, rocka, rocka, rock (so fantastic)Go rocka, rocka, rocka, rocka, rocka, rock (so elastic) Fantastic, fantastic, fantastic, fantasticElastic, elastic, elastic, elastic…

I like Winner, but “Pizza, Pasta, so so” in Everyday (without much context to the song either) seemed laughably out of place. As for a handful of other tracks, I have trouble getting into a song or taking it super seriously when the main phrase (or title) is just a made up word. Like Ddu Du Ddu Du or Zimzalabim or even Jopping (which I know, is a mash up of jumping and hopping… I just thought it was too funny though).

Jopping. Described as a combo word of jumping and popping. Those SuperM boys are extreme talents and ‘jopping’ is high key embarrassing. I’d expect this word for an enthusiastic teen group but, not for superstar talent like Taemin, Kai, Baekhyun and others. You know how we get down (jopping)How we get down (jopping)How we get down 'cause when we jumping and poppingWe jopping

Loona - so what “Im so bad! I'm so bad! I'm so bad! I'M SO BADDD!” I hate when girl groups always use the “I'm so bad” lyric it's annoying af and it doesn't make the song really powerful it's all just cringy. Just all the lyrics in NCT 127 - Regular English ver. And no don't Stan loona their fandom is annoying asf

I present to you, the most awkward K-Pop lyric ever. Bar none. NONE. This single line outdoes anything and everything else: “I really wanna touch myself” Ooooooooooooh… bruh. It’s from DBSK’s Purple Line. If you don’t know it, you can hear it here at around 0:37:  I don’t think anything can top that awkward (purple) line…

I love the GOT7 song Calling My Name, however, in the song Mark has an English rap that just fits awkwardly, and sounds kinda cringey. You are a part of me You and me, we are one You're the reason for my life If you're not here, I'm not here
